SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliCategoria] ( [ImmobiliCategoria_Ky] tinyint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_Descrizione] varchar(20) NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_DescrizioneHTML] varchar(20) NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_UserInsert] int NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_UserUpdate] int NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_UserDelete] int NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [ImmobiliCategoria_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ImmobiliCategoria] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_ImmobiliCategoria_1 PRIMARY KEY ([ImmobiliCategoria_Ky])
